roleset.name: cf give

example.name: Light Verb Construction
example.text: So [the bank 's board]-1 decided *PRO*-1 to make 1.23 billion Malaysian dollars in provisions for interest payments from loans.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In this paper we attempt to reveal how hospitals alter their provision of care to the poor in a more cost conscious and competitive environment.
example.arg: in a more cost conscious and competitive environment.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry provide.01, maps to Vncls fulfilling-13.4.1-2.
